website_summaries.verdict: These mini LED flashlights make a handy and affordable party favor.
pros: Mini LED flashlights are bright and convenient
Pack of 12 comes in assorted colors including red, blue, purple, and black
Flashlights sit at a low price point
cons: Some of the included batteries die quickly, but they are easy to replace

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for young children
customer_reviews.text: I thought I read on the description that these had AAA batteries, which is why I bought them. When we got them they were cheaply made enough that I was easily able to crack one open to look at the batteries. They are powered by 3 tiny button batteries which are extremely dangerous for children if ingested. I planned to give them as party favors at a 5 year olds birthday party but at the request of my husband, an ER doctor, I removed them all and will be returning them. They did work and are cute for older kids but dangerous for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: So simple, yet so important
customer_reviews.text: Our son turned 5 and we were having a birthday party for him. He had 14 friends coming and my wife thought that with most of his friends being boys, they would love to have a flashlight. What kid doesn't like flashlights? So we researched them and found this one. They shipped on time. We received them in plenty of time for us to include them in the gift bags for the kids. They did not disappoint us! The kids found them in their gift bags and asked if they could take them out. They played with them for the rest of the party. It was a great gift for the kids. I hope their parents agree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffers!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little flashlights. Most of them work, others are low light or no light. but they are nice to have around. I have learned to always keep little flashlights on all the doorknobs in my home. I put string on them and hang them up. Good for dark closets or under the sink. When the power goes out, I know where to go to get a light. Great for kids, and they are bright, so don't flash them in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: LaneyBee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my class to use and when I first opened the package 1 didn’t work from the start. One broke during the first use, and another broke during the 2nd use. My students were gentle with them, so I know it wasn’t their fault. I like that they are priced cheap, but I’d rather spend $1 on each flash light from the Dollar Tree than to purchase these again. They are cheaper than CHEAP! Best not to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica and Trace

customer_reviews.title: Nice little flashlights.
customer_reviews.text: Flashlights look very cool for what they are... inexpensive party favors. I tested all 12 and ended up with two needing new batteries (hence 4 stars). Not a big deal, but I'd suggest always testing. If you need all of them working for a party, or whatever, it'd be a bummer to leave 1 or 2 guests with non-functional flashlights while everyone else is playing. Seller sent email after I received, asking if everything was alright. I'm guessing they would've remedied the non-working units, but I just ordered batteries on my own (I needed some for another device already, so it wasn't a big deal.).
customer_reviews.author: Takewe

customer_reviews.title: 11 of the 12 worked, and the 12th worked ...
customer_reviews.text: 11 of the 12 worked, and the 12th worked after I put in new LR44 batteries (each flashlight takes three) which are cheap enough but might not be conveniently found in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Useful little lights that can nest anywhere you might need one
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in advent calendars for my grandchildren, but before I could tuck them away, everyone in the house needed one. They've disappeared into corner cabinets, fuse boxes, any number of dark recesses. There is one hanging by the basement stairs, another by the back door, and one under the kitchen sink. Don't think I would take one on a night hike through the woods, but for close-up chores, they're useful.
customer_reviews.author: Micajah

customer_reviews.title: Some Stayed Closed,  Some Didn't
customer_reviews.text: The flashlights were cute. They would've been great for what I needed them for; however, I had issues with them. The issues I had with them is how there wasn't any instructions about removing the small plastic inside before use. I fiddled with it until I realized that is what I needed to do. The other issue is several were broken, they would not stay closed as if they were stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Senoj97

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues on the Tight End
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright, price is also reasonable. But after used for several weeks, found out the end side of the chain area which tighten in for the battery house, the screw won't be screwed in in tight, it always lose and not able to tight. Even the price is low, but the quality issues is not worthy the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Making reading fun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my daughter-in-law who is a 4th grade teacher. She wanted to get her children more Interested in reading so she made a game of it. She closed all the blinds and cut off the lights and let the children read by the light from the little flashlights. It was a big hit with the kids and made reading fun!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Macomson

customer_reviews.title: Some arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: These were what I was looking for, however, I was a little disappointed in the quality. I ordered 2 sets of these and both shipments arrived with a few broken flashlights. I now don't have enough to send to my students. I feel they will break easily once the kids start handling them. I mostly wish they would've all arrived in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Little things are so cool!!
customer_reviews.text: My family plays a game on holidays and special occasions where we wrap little items up in plastic wrap around and around like a cocoon. One person rolls the dice while the person next to them tries to unwrap the cocoon. When doubles are rolled it is the next person's turn. It's a blast and these flashlights were perfect! The kids loved them and the adults did too. They work well and come in very handy!! Good Job guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a 0 star rating if I could. I purchased them as a fun addition to the goody bags for my son’s birthday party and they barely worked. I got a few of them to turn on haphazardly. I could barely slide the little on switch up, and even when I was able to, some still wouldn’t turn on. Super cheesy and cheaply made. I didn’t even use them in the kids’ bags.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great light!
customer_reviews.text: I have a low vision problem & require a lot of light so these little flash lights are a real asset to me. I always have one in my pocket & if I’m going out I put one in my coat pocket as well. I have other small flash lights but not this bright or as small so they are less convenient. I do have one problem with them, my sisters have seen them & so my 12 pack has shrunk to 6. I hope this helps Jamey.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. The flashlights are very cute and are just like in the picture. Delivery was on time !
customer_reviews.author: Dany Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Considered us fortunate that approx. 18/24 were functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for party favors and had to do a test to ensure we had enough. These are the cheapest made flashlights I’ve ever encountered and many of the “on” pieces simply did not move. Anyway, we bought them and I’ll bet they broke before the guests arrived home. Luckily we rounded out the little bags with some higher quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: Small light, bright light
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my neighbors in Christmas bags so they'd have light whenever they need it! I don't know how long these will last, but every one of them came on when I tested (2 orders) and the seller followed up to make sure everything arrived in good order. Yes, it did.
customer_reviews.author: Beth (part of real name)

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: If you just need a bunch of pocket sized flashlights for early walks or chores, these are a good option. I tested all of them when they arrived, and they all worked. They're very bright and are small enough to fit in a pocket. I don't need a military grade flashlight, just one that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy - Only 8 in package - not 12 and most broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Only 8 flashlights came. It advertises 8. The birthday party is on saturday and its thursday. 8 is not enough. Update: amazon agreed to send me package of 12 new lights at no cost by end of day. That was fantastic. However. The product itself - of the original 8- multiple were broken. After receiving the 12... multiple were also broken. Didnt work. No light. Cracked. Broken mirror part. Broken light cover. Extra pieces????? They have no way to change battery. Not sure what battery type used. Could break one completely open to find out but I dont have time for that. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Hazard - made worse than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a 7 year old camping birthday party. Some came split, releasing small parts, others broke apart with minimal play. Once they split, the tiny batteries are exposed. I figured they'd be cheaply made for the price, but considering the age of the kids, we'd get some use out of them at the event. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lukomski

customer_reviews.title: Not all of them work
customer_reviews.text: They arrived today but not all of them worked. They are very cheaply made, which i knew that. Just not satisfied with not all of them working. There are a lot of rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect them all to light up. But the kids loved having their very own flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons 1st grade classroom as part of their Christmas gifts but some of these didn’t work. I think I had 7 out of 24 that didn’t work at all. So I had to make a last min trip to our local dollar tree since we had 22 kids in his class. My advice is order 2 packs of these Incase you have a few that won’t light up. They are really cute and the kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Toler

customer_reviews.title: These are much smaller than I imagined but give off ...
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than I imagined but give off a decent amount of light. For a sleepover party for ten year old girls. They'll have them. Subtracted two stars because two of them do not work. I still have enough for everyone so I am not sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D. Lo

customer_reviews.title: great little flashlights
customer_reviews.text: Great little flashlights at a great price. They all work well and are of surprisingly good quality and VERY bight. They have chains and key rings, four of each blue, purple, rec, black. A great party favor or just to make sure you have a handy flashlight when you need it where you need it: next to the bed, in the car, in the garage, on your keys, in the kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Ok...not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a treat box in my classroom. I was disappointed that about half fell apart after the students starting playing with them. Most of them ended up getting a second one so they could mix and match the parts that fell off
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Goerner

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and perfect for your house key chain in case you need to unlock your door in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I gave them in a small bag of goodies at Christmas this year. I gave 4 stars because they look like they wont last for long. Still my friends were happy to get them.One in particular said she used it to see at night when she has to get up to go to the bathroom.I put the right battery with each flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: S.Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great kid-friendly pocket light
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect little lights for the Usborne Shine-a-light books I purchased for my daughter and friends. I could clip onto her backpack or my keyring to have the light whenever we wanted to read the book. Small, fun and durable. While there is no way to replace the battery, they seem to last a long time...I have had six months now.
customer_reviews.author: Libby-Lu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I've never left a review before, but this seller was persistent in asking for feedback. Because each of the 24 flashlights I ordered (2 packages of 12) worked perfectly, I decided to write this. I was impressed, because the price was so reasonable that I feared there would be duds. It seemed from the seller's emails that there may have been a problem with some other orders, because each said that the seller was happy to fix any problems asap. Again, I didn't have any problems, but if I did, it seemed like this seller would be quick to help.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Minor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but good for a party favor
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality . While they do shine a bright light, I don’t expect they will withstand much playing with before they break. The keychain broke off a few in the box. I used them as party favors in goody bags and it served its purpose for that
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE FLASHLIGHTS!
customer_reviews.text: Needed items for my sons "Santas Workshop" at school. Paid over $20 to get them on time. So a little extra for shipping. If I was selling these myself I would have had to charge around 75 cents to make any profit. These were cheaply made and a lot of them didn't even work. I should have went to Dollar Tree and bought a bulk amount of flashlights from there. They are way better quality than these and I would have spent about the same amount of money. I would't feel comfortable charging someone a dime for these. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Extremely Disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Great Flashlights
customer_reviews.text: These mini flashlights are great. Very convenient to put on your keychain. I purchased this product as bunco prizes (and of course kept one for myself). The ladies all loved them. Yes, I would recommend them. And you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne V.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, some broken
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a terrible product. Upset that the price was so high when they are very cheaply made and 8 of them don't work at all. Not worth the purchase unless you are on a time crunch. ON A GOOD NOTE: Seller contacted me and ensured a full refund, wonderful to work with. Would recommend seller, not product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Pop

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for globe boxes and key chains and duffle bags or back packs. There is no cover over the “bulb” section but that doesn’t seem to be an issue. Great deal for the price! Super bright!
customer_reviews.author: amy m.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Every one of the lights came in good working condition. They are super bright and actually hurt my eyes. I bought these as party favors for my kids birthday and they were a hit. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Needs Counting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item as a prize for my daughters bean bag toss game at her school's Valentine party. The colors were bright and fun! Love that they have batteries included. My only issue is that the (sealed) bag only had 11 items even though the package and online description show there were supposed to be a dozen. It worked out fine but could have been a problem if I needed precise quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lights
customer_reviews.text: - The 5-bulb lights are awesome, only complaint is that some of the lights only have 3 or 4 bulbs working and a couple had dead batteries (maybe the shipping accidentally turned them on). - The 2.5 Inches Mini Plastic Pocket Torch lights are not as good, only 8 out of 12 work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hovde

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for party favors for 6 year olds. They were a huge hit. Cheap, yes. But better than I expected. My son uses his to read in his bedroom or in the car. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleK

customer_reviews.title: the packaging needs to be better to protect the product
customer_reviews.text: half were broken when I received the package. the packaging needs to be better to protect the product. The flash light is very cheap, but so was the price. Get what you pay for. For young children (K-garden) they are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice for inside purse or keychain
customer_reviews.text: Compact size. Light fairly bright for hiw small they are.
customer_reviews.author: S. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well packed, and promptly. Lights are bright and seem well made. Great for keychains, gave one to each person in my family with a few left over for replacements! Good value!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Mclaurin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with everyone, big and small. I was actually pretty impressed with the amount of light these put out considering how small they are. They're perfect for a trip to the bathroom when the power is out. I didn't give these 5 stars because the little key chain is very weak and breaks easily. (Sorry Little Jamy and Donald) Our quick fix was attaching a piece of string. I would order them again for party favors etc.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of the lights didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for treat bags for my grandson's 5th birthday party; I was very disappointed; when I opened them most of the lights did not come on.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Desport

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good buy!
customer_reviews.text: All the lights worked pretty bright but some arrived cracked or the on switch wouldn’t work but if you were to squeeze the light a little it would work but they all turned on. other than that the plastic is a little flimsy but it was fine for kids to play with
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Pay More for a Better Product
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better — 12 mini flashlights for $14? Sadly, about half of them didn’t work right from the beginning, so that’s really more like paying $14 for 6 mini flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: eboo

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lights
customer_reviews.text: The 12 small flashlights produce a very bright light. I bought them for our Christmas Eve gift exchange and these little babies were being grabbed back and forth more than any other gift! It was hilarious and fun. You can put one in every room and your cars for quick access. I'm going to order more for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B. Reseda,CA

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: These are prizes for a class of young students. They work and fill the need of something fun for a reward. However, I have no idea how long they will work, if all of them work (only tested a few), or if they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Small pig, big light
customer_reviews.text: The flashlights are very colorful. Im a nursing supervisor & ordered them, along with other items, for my nurses assistants for CNA week. They are some of the hardest working people in the industry. I'll give them to my CNAs next week & will let you know what they think.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: No comment
customer_reviews.text: There are problems with few of the flashlight cover not staying connected to the body. They would pop right off. I am embarrassed to give a child this, as a goodie bag to represent my daughter’s birthday. However, the brightness of these mini flashlights, are amazing. I just wish the quality in the exterior could match up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mahealani

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quility, poor packing.
customer_reviews.text: Received the the flashlight in a zip lock bag with loose parts of flash lights ( batteries , partial flash lights parts ) attempted to assembly finding battery retainer cap would not tighten up so it would just come apart again. Returning them for refund.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these little flashlights to be added to our giveaway bags for an event, expecting about 50 bags. I purchased 48 flashlights and 11 of them do not work. I was very disappointed. Now 25% of our participants will have an incomplete bag since the event is tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great goodie bag items!
customer_reviews.text: All 12 worked great for me. I was nicely surprised how bright the light actually is. I brought these for the boys’ goodie bags for my daughter’s party, but I wish I would have bought enough for the girls’ too as my 5 yr old daughter thinks they are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be more durable
customer_reviews.text: I love all but the quality of the ring hooked to the key ring, which means it fell off and one of them doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Had a souvenir one of these that the batteries died in and was looking to replace it. It’s cheaper to buy a new light versus replacing the batteries. Great little light for your pocket, night stand, desk drawer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get a very weak light (kids weren't able to squeeze hard enough to get the light, since you have to squeeze the seams instead of the flexible part), and they run out of batteries fast even though the light is weak.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these as Halloween treats. They are 100% ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as Halloween treats. They are 100% junk. the plastic in the light fixture fall out and once they are unscrewed they don't go back together. They are meant for littles, but it's hard to turn them on, so not practical at all.
customer_reviews.author: CJP Sac

customer_reviews.title: It's a crapshoot
customer_reviews.text: Half of them don't work. The half that do are super bright. They're great giveaways at trade shows and expos, but it is super unpredictable and embarrassing when they're DOA
customer_reviews.author: S.H.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little party favors for the price
customer_reviews.text: Of course these aren't top of the line, but as little novelties they actually work quite well. Very bright! One of them does not want to keep screwed on, but the rest are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: daisymae051479

customer_reviews.title: One-fourth are defective.
customer_reviews.text: In my picture, the ones on the left worked. But out of 24, 6 did not work, right out of the box. So I can’t use them because I don’t have enough for my whole class.
customer_reviews.author: mike parikh

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Well built BUT it requires a special stack of batteries. That is the only bad thing. One time use
customer_reviews.author: John d

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Batteries (3-LR44) included with each flashlight. However, none of the flashlights worked upon arrival. Will need to get new batteries just to see if these flashlights work.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Ildefonso

customer_reviews.title: Bright Cute Keychain
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out as Halloween treats for my neices and nephews. (Ages 3 -16) They all loved them. I tested out all 12 to make sure they worked before hand and all of them worked. Bright cute little keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small, bright, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Really like these little FLASHLIGHTS. They are great in a pocket, purse, or travel kit. During storms, I pin one to my pajama pocket in case the power goes out in the night. They are small, but bright.
customer_reviews.author: s. w. solstice

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, does fall apert easy.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for child's birthday party goody bags. Inexpensive and included batteries. They do fall apart easy so do not give to smaller children. But the kids all thought they were pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: J Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Chain part will break PLEASE BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved these lights..they actually have a very nice glow to them, it also has a cover over the light so if you remove the plastic it gets brighter..... HOWEVER.....PLEASE WATCH SMALL CHILDREN WITH THE CHAINS! The chains very easily break apart and if a baby or one of the kids puts it in its mouth it could be very dangerous. On the smaller children’s lights I just removed the chains. I used them in gift bags for my children’s birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Most of these flashlights were broken by the time they arrived or broke while trying to turn them on. Do not waste your money, pay a little more for products that actually work. Small pieces break off and are dangerous for children.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Small but bright .
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Jamy you are not growing taller ! As with other reviewers 2 did not work even with working on them .Still a nice product as light beam is very bright . Had these lights before always carry one and have been so useful many times .
customer_reviews.author: D G

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kid gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: These were for a birthday party gift bag. What kid doesn't love a flashlight? And they hang on your backpack! Big hit. Didn't need to buy batteries and everyone worked. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: FL Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2nd grade students as part of their Christmas gift for flashlight reading. Many of them in the package didn't work and the children were bringing them up to me so I could to try and fix them. The slider switch wouldn't slide on for some and some of the others wouldn't stay lit. The worse part was seeing the disappointment in their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic poorly made goody bag gift the kids enjoyed them but 1/4 of them broke in the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic poorly made goody bag gift the kids enjoyed them but 1/4 of them broke in the first 5 mins the rest another 1/4 broke half way into the night Nd I gaurentee the rest didnt make it a day
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Good illumination for something that fits on a keychain
customer_reviews.text: One was defective. The rest seem to be working as advertised. I have one attached to my dog leash in case there's a night time clean up. Only weak point is that the external switch can accidentally get turned on inside your pocket. Follow up - the chains attached to the flashlights are really thin and break too easily. They lose a star.
customer_reviews.author: alkan50

customer_reviews.title: Most are faulty
customer_reviews.text: This came on time, but most didn't work or broke immediately. Luckily, we didn't rely on these crappy flashlights for events or favors.
customer_reviews.author: rose76

customer_reviews.title: Broke too easy
customer_reviews.text: These were a reward. My students barely got back to their desks with them before they broke!
customer_reviews.author: Generous Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and light is bright. Most of the keychains broke off though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Theno

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These flashlights were a hit in my son's 16th birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I put these in Christmas stocking at work. To be out at night and have the flashlight is great. It has a strong beam that projects wide. Very nice to have on your keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Fun and practical party favors!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and colorful. Fun for children! Very bright flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: fae

customer_reviews.title: Nice door prizes
customer_reviews.text: We gave these as door prizes at National Night Out. They were very popular.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: These are great little flashlights, with little being the operative word. For the price they are great. Unfortunately, three of them were on when I received my package, and they are not at all brightly shining. They are cute and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I received a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the batch I received due to the ill fitting end caps. The batteries kept popping out.
customer_reviews.author: c .williams

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Light is bright. Con: We were given 11 not 12. Only 4 out of the 11 worked. The others were broken, batteries dead, battery compartments wouldn’t stay screwed, or it fell apart. Will definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: I had a kids party and they received the flashlights in their party bags and everybody loved them.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly prkeli

customer_reviews.title: /Defective Flashlights
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I had ordered this product several times, and they were great for us to use and give to friends. But this last order I placed was not good. I followed the directions of removing the shield from the batteries, but I have 10 of the 15 flashlights that don't work. Most of them did not have a shield attached to it, and so I don't know if the batteries had expired. I even took out the 3 batteries the flashlight comes with to make sure that there was nothing else blocking it. I think there was no quality control on these last flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: rustu agi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use these flashlights for Flashlight Reading Friday with students. Some did not work and those that did work, stopped working within 10 minutes. Students were highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: altagracia baez

customer_reviews.title: Good for gift sacks
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and light well but a few were broken when I opened the bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: Some of these had fallen apart in the bag they came in and they are not well made! A few of them don’t even turn on AT ALL and I needed all 24 for goodie bags. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: JM Marrs

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this highly rated product, I thought it would be perfect for my son’s outdoor movie night themed birthday. I received the flashlights today and several were cracked and didn’t work. I should have just gone to the dollar store and purchased a higher quality item for around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used for goody bags for my child's birthday, because my kids are obsessed with flashlights. I didnt check them all to see of they worked, but the few i did check, turned on and off easily. i like the keychain idea... kids can use for their backpacks, lunch bags, camping, and just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Bacerra

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Break very easily
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous, all of them stopped working on the first day. They break if dropped. Such a waste of money - spend a little more and get the metal ones!
customer_reviews.author: GrangerRanger82

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These were for my students. Some of the flashlights broke or did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Larson

customer_reviews.title: work great, fits in any cubby
customer_reviews.text: As described and each one works great. I use them everywhere, home and work. Also great stocking stuffers!
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for goodie bags for a party and they are cute and bright lights. They are not very well made though. The first night all the keychains broke and one cracked from just carrying it around. I was hoping they were a little more sturdy and a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's birthday at the corn maze . The were a hit. Tiny flash lights perfect for kids, but the light is surprisingly bright and clear. Highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Briceno

customer_reviews.title: Well worth price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these flash lights to put in birthday party favor bags. They arrived on time and are extremely bright. I'm sure the littles invited to my 5 year old Grandsons birthday party will be very happy. I would definatly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Harris

customer_reviews.title: Bright idea.
customer_reviews.text: These made great party favors. Everyone loved them. Handy on your key fob at night.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Selby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Don’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: Half of them didn’t work when I received them. Some broke while handling them. Very cheaply made. Not worth any money!
customer_reviews.author: K Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not one flashlight works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mini lights last September and they were great . My husband uses them at night so he won’t disturb me. I bought two packages more for Father’s Day. Not one of them will light, and the return window closed two days ago. Good luck, folks ! Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Fleisig

customer_reviews.title: Best small Flash light
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most about these little flash lights is that they are very powerful for their size and are great for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Sytnik

customer_reviews.title: Favor flashlight
customer_reviews.text: A good little flashlight for a favor or just for little ones to play. They last long even thou they are a little fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: 3 flashlights are not usable. I can’t screw on the ends without them coming off. Did not come with enough batteries. Otherwise, great little flashlights!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. Had to return. Some were broken or just didn’t work. Ended up just buying some at the dollar tree.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

product_meta.title: Kicko Mini LED Flashlight Keychains - 12 Pack - 2.5 Inch Assorted Colors, Plastic Pocket Size Torch - 5-Bulb Keyring for Camping, Kids, Party Favors, Goody Bag Fillers, Gifts, Prizes
feature_bullets: BLACKOUT SOLUTION - These flashing lights feature 5 LED bulbs and come in 12 packs of different colors: black, red, blue, and sky blue! For bright indoor and outdoor activities, Kicko offers 2.5” pen lights and a metal chain to separately fasten vital keys - preventing tangling and loss. To use, Unscrew the base and remove the protective paper in the battery terminal.

NEVER FUMBLE IN THE DARK - Kicko’s Tiny Lamps have many functions including exigencies and signaling. They provide adequate white beams to help you search for stuff inside your drawer, wallet, and other places. They also promote safe walking in the night or along the hallway, by giving out a warning sign.

VERSATILITY AND PORTABILITY - These small key fobs are secured, versatile and portable. They save space in pouches and are easily attachable to belt loops, backpacks, handbags, or walls. You can conveniently carry them during at school, while camping, biking, and hiking.

KEYCHAIN TORCH SET - Made from high-grade quality, trusted plastic materials for long-lasting, satisfying performance, these powerful pocket lights are battery operated, lightweight, and compact. Their handles provide comfortable grips and have simple on/off switch buttons.

ENGAGING COLLECTION - These colorful flashlight key holder are fun to collect and share with kids, teens, adults, and seniors! Enjoyable to use as gaming materials, stuffers and prizes during themed parties, they’re also ideal for birthday celebrations, corporate and holiday gatherings.
